DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion healthy men woman age 2035 , BMI < 27.5 kg/m2 , fast blood glucose < 126 mg/dl . History diabetes , history obesity ( BMI > 30 ) . History know inherited medical condition might influence future health status . Current plan medication usage might influence future health status . Prior serious injuries/surgeries might influence future health status . Women pregnant breastfeeding ( enrol , pregnancy cause subject terminate study ) . Women < 6 month postpartal , woman discontinue breastfeed < 3 month prior screen . History cancer ( include skin cancer ) within 5 year . History organ transplant . Previous diagnosis HIV , Hepatitis B C , tuberculosis . Abuse alcohol illegal drug . Abnormal EKG . Presence pacemaker , defibrillator , implant metal . History eat disorder abnormal psychological score screen measure describe Psychological Assessment Measures Appendix . This psychological screening conduct approximately two week prior outpatient testing .
